annotation.text: The Code of Maryland Regulations (COMAR) contains all regulations for Maryland State agencies and departments. There is no cost to use COMAR online.
COMAR is updated every two weeks.
Learn about the COMAR numbering system.

Before a regulation is adopted and incorporated into COMAR, it is available in a proposed form in the Maryland Register for the public to review and provide feedback on. The Register is published every two weeks and includes:

ul.li: Other documents considered to be in the public interest

annotation.text: The text appearing here was produced from materials provided by the Division of State Documents, Office of the Secretary of State, State of Maryland, and is current as of . The text appearing here is not the official text. While this text has been prepared from data created and maintained by the Division of State Documents, only the printed or electronic version of the text obtained directly from the Division of State Documents is official, valid, and enforceable under Maryland law.

COMAR and the Maryland Register are available in print or PDF for purchase in an assembled, easy-to-read format. See Publications to Order or call our Subscription Office at 410-260-3876 to order by phone.
